title: How to have 10 million subscribers for my YouTube channel - Quora

response.answer_text: 10 million subscribers only a trick work There is no shortcut.  an one line solution and it work only  only one straight one line solution. just create good video and upload with pray of god, remember don’t make any video on controversial or disputed matters. i have seen number of channel who got more than that only by blessings of god. have a nice day.
